verses.text: \w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*’s \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H2814"\w* \w silent|strong="H2814"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*’s \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H2814"\w* \w still|strong="H2814"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* shines \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bright|strong="H5051"\w* \w light|strong="H5051"\w*, \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* blazing \w torch|strong="H3940"\w*.

\w Nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bestow.

\w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4410"\w* \w diadem|strong="H6797"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w palm|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* land \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w Desolate|strong="H8077"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Hephzibah|strong="H2657"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* land \w Beulah|strong="H1166"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H2654"\w* \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* land \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* bride.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w marries|strong="H1166"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* woman, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w marry|strong="H1166"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w* \w rejoices|strong="H7797"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* God \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* posted \w watchmen|strong="H8104"\w*; \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w silent|strong="H2814"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w call|strong="H2142"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H8104"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H1824"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w*,

nor \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Him|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w rest|strong="H1824"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w establishes|strong="H3559"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w makes|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w of|strong="H8416"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w mighty|strong="H5797"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*: “Never \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w grain|strong="H1715"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w*, \w nor|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1121"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w toiled|strong="H3021"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* harvest grain \w will|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* grapes \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wine \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*.”

\w Go|strong="H5674"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w*, \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; \w prepare|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*! \w Build|strong="H5549"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w*, \w build|strong="H5549"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w highway|strong="H4546"\w*; \w clear|strong="H6437"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w stones|strong="H5619"\w*; \w raise|strong="H7311"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w banner|strong="H5251"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*!

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ends|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, “Say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: \w See|strong="H2009"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* Savior \w comes|strong="H6440"\w*! \w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w reward|strong="H7939"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w recompense|strong="H6468"\w* \w goes|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w People|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w Out|strong="H1875"\w*, \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*.
